of the goals of Live Action is to get members of Congress to defund Planned Parenthood. It's no coincidence that this incident comes on the heels of Mike Pence 's( R-IN) introduction of H.R. 217, the Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act. The bill was introduced with the specific purpose of targeting Planned Parenthood. So what's at stake?
